exam.question: A love marriage, however, does not necessarily ________ much

answer.explain: result in：  导致， 结果是。 句意：  然而， 恋爱结婚的结果未必是共同分享利益， 并且共同承担责任。take over：  接管， 接收； hold on：  紧握； 等一会儿； keep to：  遵守； 坚持。

sentences.sContent: How would you cope with unemployment and the resulting loss of income?
sentences.sCn: 你会如何应付失业及由此造成的收入损失？

sentences.sContent: ...Leslie criticizes the received wisdom that academic success is the result of a combination of intellectual talent and hard work...
...political leaders' lack of curiosity will result in bad consequences...
...which may result in muscle pain and visual impair...
...This can result in severe penalties that continue long after punishment is completed...
...The result has been a decrease in the number of American college graduates who have the skills...
...And not knowing them can result in great embarrassment...
...Scientists are in　general agreement that the warmer conditions we have been experiencing are at least in part the result of a human-induced global warming trend...
...The result of constant muscle tension and stiffness of joints...

synos.tran: 结果；成绩；答案；比赛结果

phrases.pCn: adv. 因此，由于；作为…的结果
考试结果，成绩；核赔结论
预期的结果；希望达到的结果

words.tran: 合力；结果；[化学] 生成物

trans.tranOther: if something results from something else, it is caused by it
something that happens or exists because of something that happened before
